title: Module 3 Quiz: Community, Governance, and Responsible Business

questions.question: Approximately how many sites does Contact Energy operate across New Zealand with community engagement plans?
questions.questionHtml: Approximately how many sites does Contact Energy operate across New Zealand with community engagement plans?
questions.feedback: Contact operates across approximately 45 sites throughout New Zealand, with community engagement plans in place at each location.

questions.question: In what year did Contact establish New Zealand's first Green Borrowing Programme?
questions.questionHtml: In what year did Contact establish New Zealand's first Green Borrowing Programme?
questions.feedback: In 2017, Contact was the first company in New Zealand to establish a Green Borrowing Programme, pioneering sustainable finance in the country.

questions.question: What threatened species does Contact support releasing on Tūwharetoa iwi land in Taupō?

questions.question: Which of the following are included in Contact's responsible procurement screening? (Select all that apply)
questions.questionHtml: Which of the following are included in Contact's responsible procurement screening? (Select all that apply)

questions.question: Which conservation group has Contact partnered with since 2013, supporting over 200,000 native trees planted?
